Summary Note:
Lefebvre Lambert David and the RM met at a networking event in Paris. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Having worked for over 27 years, Lefebvre Lambert David brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Lefebvre Lambert David is currently widowed. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Lefebvre finished secondary school at Lycée Vaucanson in 1993.
Lefebvre earned his degree from La Fémis in 1999.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 27 years, Lefebvre Lambert David has established himself as a key player in the industry.
In 1998, Lefebvre Lambert David started working as a Art Dealer at Musée Rodin, marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 2002, he moved to Centre Pompidou to work as a Gallery Owner, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 440000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has flat located in Rouen, worth 1460000 EUR.


Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Oil and Gas Executive, he received an inheritance of 8940000 EUR in 2010, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
